subject_terms_3: 1942-1945 Japanese occupation Great Britain, Royal Air Force
physical_appearance: This is an armband worn by Japanese soldier in Changi Prisoners of War camp. It is rectangular in shape, and has a Kanji inscription in the center, with a 'No. 50' below it. The cloth is slightly stained especially along the folds and the edges.
sgcool_label_text: "This was an armband worn by a Japanese soldier in the Changi POW camp. The Japanese characters are read as ""Hosa""
title_text: Armband worn by Japanese soldier in Changi POW camp
subject_terms_1: prisoners of war world wars military officers Kanji (writing system)
subject_terms_2: Armbands Great Britain, Royal Air Force Prisoner of war World War, 1939-1945 Kanji
